gramGrp.pos:
UNCOUNT N
or
COUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
The height of a person or thing
je mera neke osebe ali predmeta od vrha do tal.

seg.quote: The redwood grows to 100 metres in height.
This enables them to grow to considerable heights.

sense.def:
Height
je lastnost, da je nekdo ali nekaj visok.

seg.quote: You'll recognize her because of her height.

gramGrp.pos:
UNCOUNT N
or
COUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
A particular height
je oddaljenost nečesa od tal.

seg.quote: The aircraft reaches its maximum height of 80,000 feet in about ten minutes.
The bag had been dropped from about shoulder height.

sense.def:
Izraz
heights
uporabljamo za vrh hriba ali pečine.

seg.quote: ...fierce fighting on the heights above the bay.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
at its height
, je najbolj uspešno, močno ali silovito.

seg.quote: The group had at its height 500 members.
It is the height of the tourist season.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
height
lahko poudarimo, kako izjemna je neka lastnost. Na primer, če rečemo, da je nekaj
the height of absurdity
, hočemo povedati, da je zelo nesmiselno;

seg.quote: It seemed to me the height of luxury.
